minneriya kalapaye itha dushkara gammana pihita athi bawath, mema gammana wala janathawa higurakgoda polatama awashya da miladi ganimata paminiya yuthu bawath, samruddhi wadasatahana thulin bihiwu wiwidha wyapruthilabhinge nishpadana alewiyata awasthawak salasa dimath, dushkara gammana wala janathawata thama awatin athyawashaya da miladi ganime pahasuwa pinisath, higurakgoda pradeshiya lekam thumiyage magapenwima matha kalapaye siyaluma samruddhi sanwardhana niladhari mahathma mahathmingeda samruddhi prajamula sanwidhana wala garu sabhapathi mahathma mahathmingeda sahayogayen wiwidha nishpadana wala niratha samruddhi ha adu aadayamlabhin 25 denekugen mema sathipola aarambha kala bawayi.

me hara rajya depala awabhawithaya sambandhayen wisheshitha balayak 104 aa (4) (a) yatathe laba di athi athara, chanda wimasim kalawaladi rajya madhya athulu janamadhyayan hasirawima pilibandawa madhya upamana niyama kirimata ha eeta adalawa widhiwidhana panawimata ida salasa atha. 104 a yatathe polis balathala bhawithayata da, 104 aa yatathe sannaddha hamuda yedawimatada, komishan sabhawa wetha wishesha balayak dahahath wana aandukrama wyawasthawa yatathe laba di thibe.

nawa idiriyedi nirmanayak enna thiyenawa.
boho kawya nirmana wala ambau samiyan iratath , handatath upama kara thibenu ma daka atha.
